medical_history.chief_complaint: RUQ pain with radiation to the back after a fatty meal.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient started experiencing RUQ pain approximately one hour after a fatty meal at ~8pm. There was an episode of non-bilious, non-bloody emesis in the ED. Previous similar episode occurred in mid ___, leading to referral for surgical management of biliary colic symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type I DM with retinopathy, neuropathy, and nephropathy; CHF; CKD; OSA on CPAP; morbid obesity; depression; s/p leg injury while at work.
medical_history.family_history: Grandmother had diabetes; father had an MI; paternal grandfather had multiple MIs (died from massive MI); brother had recent valve replacement (diagnosed with valve problem as a teenager). No family history of blood clots or arrhythmias.
